thread.title: Janet Hughes
thread.title_full: Optical Express | Laser Eye Surgery reviewed by Janet Hughes

author: Janet Hughes
title: Janet Hughes
text:
After having thought about this procedure for over 3 years now, I finally took the plunge in January this year. I was extremely anxious, however I need not have been. The procedure was simple, painless and the recovery rapid and trouble free. After a couple of hours of mild discomfort on the day, I woke up the next morning to perfect vision and any discomfort had disappeared.
The whole process was a hundred times better than I had expected and I unreservedly recommend the procedure and Optical Express.
